annotations.description: This drink is a recipe from the Detroit Wonder Bar in Detroit Michigan (duh) and was published in Ted Saucer’s Bottoms Up in 1951. Although not much evidence...
annotations.title: Master The Classics: Between the Sheets (Happy Valentine's Day!)

textContent:
.75oz (22.5ml) Aged Rum 
1oz (30ml) Cointreau
.75oz (22.5ml) Cognac
.5oz (15ml) Lemon Juice

Shake and strain

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cd5ohLLkzYM&t=0s
title: Under the Sheets
